author: Timothy Bates
comment: I installed this thinking it would be fun to play with for a day. But it has proven very practical. You can rapidly dial in costs and split the bill. Handy to show other people the calculation too! And no need to drag out your phone... Update: unlike Ben and others I have had zero crashes, and it scrolls across the screens perfectly on moto360. Assume these reviews are for older versions.  In the "must install" category
title: Actually very useful!

author: Ben Wellington
comment: This would be a great tool but it has a lot of trouble when attempting to go back one step: swiping across the screen from left to right doesn't do anything most of the time. You have to swipe down from the top a few times before it will recognize a left to right swipe. Also you can swipe slightly to the left and then back right to go backwards. Definitely looking forward to this app once it gets fixed!
title: It looks very nice but it has trouble scrolling back on moto 360

author: Jeff Sellers
comment: I like the app but think there should be some kind of summary screen to show the end data including the tip amount.
title: Good but not great

comment: This app looks great on the Moto 360 but I'm having a hard time flipping through the app. Easy 5 star if this was fixed. Keep up the great work
title: Has potential.

author: Tony Nicklow
comment: Doesn't tell you how much the tip is
title: Ok not the easiest app to use

author: Will S
comment: Is this actually needed? Man... People are getting dumber and dumber
title: Really?

author: Mustafa Hashmi
comment: Pls add a 4th screen to show a full summary: subtotal, tip value, slipt, final total. Thanks

author: Mike Engel
comment: OK.  Does not display the amount of the tip, just the resulting total.

author: Mc-Shane Shinners
comment: Phone on wrist no longer in pockets
title: Wanka

author: Michael W
comment: Wish it showed the tip amount.
title: Works OK.

author: J Baade
comment: Set the bill amount... Went to the tip % screen... A different bill amount was there. Tried again. Same thing. So I uninstalled it.

author: Jethro Eng
comment: This app have a nice interface, easy to use but I can't exit after that. I'm using Sony Smartwatch 3
title: Exit problem

author: Ryan H
comment: The app won't close on zenwatch... Had to uninstall just to exit the app. Otherwise, it's a great idea and does what it says. The dev should fix and would be 4-5 star rating, but unacceptable to have an app that you can't exit.
title: Can't close the app
